t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - From a campaign management perspective, by automating the traditional 70-step campaign creation process, Brand+ and Performance+ reduce complexity and provide real-time reporting and AI-driven optimizations, enabling brands to stay competitive and drive better business results.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Full Synthetic Motor Oil - 0W-20 - 5 Quart, 160 fl oz (Pack of 1) : Automotive
s: Customers find this synthetic motor oil performs well, comparing favorably to name-brand alternatives and meeting stringent industry standards. The oil keeps engines running smoothly and maintains cleanliness, with one customer noting no sludge or metal shavings during oil changes.

t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 5 days ago - Calzedonia just launched a swimwear collection on Amazon featuring unique, colorful one-pieces, bikinis and cover-ups that are great for the beach or pool.

t: In A Survey, Amazon Stands Out As Minnesota's Most Trusted Retail Brand
s: Amazon tops a recent survey as America's most trusted retail brand, with 11 facilities enhancing service in Minnesota's evolving retail scene.
